original: Maṇḍanamiśra:
analyzed: maṇḍana miśra

original: Vibhramaviveka
analyzed: vibhrama viveka

original: ātmakhyātir asatkhyātir akhyātiḥ khyātir anyathā /
analyzed: ātma khyātiḥ asat khyātiḥ akhyātiḥ khyātiḥ anyathā

original: parīkṣakāṇāṃ vibhrāntau vivādāt sā vivicyate // MVibhr_1 //
analyzed: parīkṣakāṇām vibhrāntau vivādāt sā vivicyate

original: asac cakasti na vyomakusuma? na ............. /
analyzed: asat cakasti na vyomakusuma na

original: arthaḥ prakāśate 'to dhīs tadākāreti kecana // MVibhr_2 //
analyzed: arthaḥ prakāśate dhīḥ tad ākārā iti kecana

original: asaṃbhavi ca yāvac ca tāvat saṃparihīyatām /
analyzed: asaṃbhavi ca yāvat ca tāvat saṃparihīyatām

original: saṃvedyākārasaṃtyāgo na bhrāntitve 'vakalpate // MVibhr_3 //
analyzed: saṃvedya ākāra saṃtyāgaḥ na bhrānti tve

original: ekadeśāpabādhena kalpamāne ca bādhake /
analyzed: eka deśa apabādhena kalpamāne ca bādhake

original: na sarvabādhanaṃ yuktam iti nyāyavidaḥ sthitāḥ // MVibhr_4 //
analyzed: na sarva bādhanam yuktam iti nyāya vidaḥ sthitāḥ

original: anyo bahir bhāsamāno nāntar arhati dhāraṇam /
analyzed: anyaḥ bahis bhāsamānaḥ na antar arhati dhāraṇam

original: asattaiva varaṃ tasya bhrāntitvānuguṇā hi sā // MVibhr_5 //
analyzed: asat tā eva varam tasya bhrānti tva anuguṇā hi sā

original: nāntarvartitayā bhrāntir asattvena tu seṣyate /
analyzed: na antar varti tayā bhrāntiḥ asattvena tu sā iṣyate

original: akalpayitvāntas tasmād asattāṃ khalv acīkḷpat // MVibhr_6 //
analyzed: a kalpayitvā antar tasmāt asat tām khalu acīkṷpat

original: nāntarvartibahirbhāso bhrāntitvānupapattitaḥ /
analyzed: na antar varti bahis bhāsaḥ bhrānti tva anupapattitaḥ

original: asattvenaiva tatkḷptau na pramāṇavatī hi sā // MVibhr_7 //
analyzed: asattvena eva tad kḷptau na pramāṇavatī hi sā

original: yathāvabhāsamānasya kalpyāsattā niyogataḥ /
analyzed: yathā avabhāsamānasya kalpyā asattā niyogataḥ

original: antarbhāve 'pi ca bahirbhāve bhrāntir na yujyate // MVibhr_8 //
analyzed: antarbhāve ca bahirbhāve bhrāntiḥ na yujyate

original: akhyāter aviśeṣeṇa syāt suṣupte 'pi vibhramaḥ /
analyzed: akhyāteḥ aviśeṣeṇa syāt suṣupte vibhramaḥ

original: akhyātiḥ khalu tatrāpi na cākhyātir viśiṣyate // MVibhr_9 //
analyzed: akhyātiḥ khalu tatra api na ca akhyātiḥ viśiṣyate

original: upālambhasya na padam asato 'tra prakāśanam /
analyzed: upālambhasya na padam asataḥ tra prakāśanam

original: ata eva yato bhrāntiḥ samyakkhyātau tathā bhavet // MVibhr_10 //
analyzed: atas eva yatas bhrāntiḥ samyak khyātau tathā bhavet

original: yujyate nānyathākhyātir niradhiṣṭhānavibhrame /
analyzed: yujyate na anyathā khyātiḥ niradhiṣṭhāna vibhrame

original: svapne hi niradhiṣṭhāno vibhramo vītasaṃśayaḥ // MVibhr_11 //
analyzed: svapne hi niradhiṣṭhānaḥ vibhramaḥ vīta saṃśayaḥ

original: tatrāpy avartamānaṃ ced gṛhyate vartamānavat /
analyzed: tatra api avartamānam ced gṛhyate vartamāna vat

original: avartamānasyāsattā khapuṣpān na viśiṣyate // MVibhr_12 //
analyzed: avartamānasya asattā khapuṣpāt na viśiṣyate

original: atyantānanubhūtānāṃ parasparaparāṇudām /
analyzed: atyanta ananubhūtānām paraspara parāṇudām

original: dṛṣṭeś cāvartamānasya na khyānaṃ vartamānavat // MVibhr_13 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭeḥ ca avartamānasya na khyānam vartamāna vat

original: khapuṣpatulye kā khyātir nīrūpeṇaiva bhāsanāt /
analyzed: kha puṣpa tulye kā khyātiḥ nīrūpeṇa eva bhāsanāt

original: tad api vyavahārāṅgaṃ rūpavattvena bhāsanāt // MVibhr_14 //
analyzed: tat api vyavahāra aṅgam rūpavat tvena bhāsanāt

original: kalpanāyām api tv evaṃ nāsatkhyātivivarjanam /
analyzed: kalpanāyām api tu evam na asat khyāti vivarjanam

original: prakārāntarasaṃsargo nanv asann eva bhāsate // MVibhr_15 //
tasmād asata evedaṃ rūpavattvena bhāsanam /
analyzed: tasmāt asataḥ eva idam rūpavat tvena bhāsanam

original: avaśyakalpanīyatvāt kalpanāyāś ca lāghavāt // MVibhr_16 //
analyzed: avaśya kalpanīya tvāt kalpanāyāḥ ca lāghavāt

original: prāktattvajñānasaṃskāras tatprabodhas sakāranaḥ /
smarāmīti pramoṣas sahetur indriyayoginaḥ // MVibhr_17 //
analyzed: smarāmi iti pramoṣaḥ sa hetuḥ indriya yoginaḥ

original: bhrāntau sahākṣair manaso duṣṭatāntarvivartitā /
analyzed: bhrāntau saha akṣaiḥ manasaḥ duṣṭa tā antar vivarti tā

original: kāmaprakarṣamaraṇamūrcchāśokāmayādiṣu // MVibhr_18 //
analyzed: kāma prakarṣa maraṇa mūrcchā śoka āmaya ādiṣu

original: ucchedakeṣu bahulaṃ saṃskārasyānuvartanam /
analyzed: ucchedakeṣu bahulam saṃskārasya anuvartanam

original: parapakṣeṣu kalpyāni bhūyiṣṭhānīti dṛśyate // MVibhr_19 //
analyzed: parapakṣeṣu kalpyāni bhūyiṣṭhāni iti dṛśyate

original: sarvasaṃskāravicchedimaraṇāntarite 'smṛteḥ /
analyzed: sarva saṃskāra vicchedi maraṇa antarite smṛteḥ

original: janmāntarānubhūtaṃ ca na smaryata iti sthitam // MVibhr_20 // ........ ........ /
analyzed: janma antara anubhūtam ca na smaryate iti sthitam
prāk

original: mandasaṃskārasahakṛd ucchede tena vā vinā /
analyzed: manda saṃskāra sahakṛt ucchede tena vā vinā

original: doṣaiḥ kṣataṃ manaḥ kāryi praṇidhānādivarjitam // MVibhr_22 //
analyzed: doṣaiḥ kṣatam manaḥ kāryi praṇidhāna ādi varjitam

original: doṣair avikṛtaṃ svasthaṃ praṇidhānādisaṃskṛtam /
analyzed: doṣaiḥ avikṛtam svastham praṇidhāna ādi saṃskṛtam

original: na kāryavaj jāgarāyām aho nayavidāṃ paraḥ // MVibhr_23 //
analyzed: na kārya vat jāgarāyām aho naya vidām paraḥ

original: doṣakṣatiḥ kāryaśaktihānirūpā ca vidyate /
analyzed: doṣa kṣatiḥ kārya śakti hāni rūpā ca vidyate

original: atirekaś ca kāryasyety aho nyāyavivekitā // MVibhr_24 //
analyzed: atirekaḥ ca kāryasya iti aho nyāya viveki tā

original: adhyārope bhaved gauṇī vāhīke gomatir yathā /
analyzed: adhyārope bhavet gauṇī vāhīke gomatiḥ yathā

original: na saṃvidānuguṇyaṃ syān na vivekamatir yadi // MVibhr_25 //
analyzed: na saṃvidā ānuguṇyam syāt na viveka matiḥ yadi

original: akhyātir api saṃvittiṃ naivānveti yato matiḥ /
analyzed: akhyātiḥ api saṃvittim na eva anveti yatas matiḥ

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyena rūpyam etad iti sthitā // MVibhr_26 //
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyena rūpyam etat iti sthitā

original: tasmād vibhrama evāyam iti yukto viniścayaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt vibhramaḥ eva ayam iti yuktaḥ viniścayaḥ

original: na saṃvidanusāreṇa nimittaṃ tasya yujyate // MVibhr_27 //
analyzed: na saṃvid anusāreṇa nimittam tasya yujyate

original: ato 'nirvacanīyatvaṃ varaṃ brahmavido viduḥ /
analyzed: atas nirvacanīya tvam varam brahma vidaḥ viduḥ

original: avidyāyā avidyātvam anyathā parihīyate // MVibhr_28 //
analyzed: avidyāyāḥ avidyā tvam anyathā parihīyate

original: sattve na mithyā śūnyatve durnirūpaṃ prakāśanam /
analyzed: sattve na mithyā śūnyatve durnirūpam prakāśanam

original: sadasatbhyām anirvācyāṃ tām avidyāṃ pracakṣate // MVibhr_29 //
analyzed: sat asatbhyām anirvācyām tām avidyām pracakṣate

original: vastuno 'nveṣaṇā tasyāṃ bāhyābhyantaravartinaḥ /
analyzed: vastunaḥ nu eṣaṇā tasyām bāhya abhyantara vartinaḥ

original: na yujyate yatra tatra vedyavastuni tatkṣateḥ // MVibhr_30 //
analyzed: na yujyate yatra tatra vedya vastuni tad kṣateḥ

original: nāmarūpaprapañco 'yam avidyaiva ca varṇyate /
analyzed: nāma rūpa prapañcaḥ yam avidyā eva ca varṇyate

original: anyasya tv anyathā khyātau na prapañcavyapahnavaḥ // MVibhr_31 //
analyzed: anyasya tu anyathā khyātau na prapañca vyapahnavaḥ

original: akhyātau śūnyam eva syāt prapañcaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: akhyātau śūnyam eva syāt prapañcaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ

original: aprapañcaḥ saprapañcarūpo bhātīti yujyate // MVibhr_32 //
analyzed: aprapañcaḥ sa prapañca rūpaḥ bhāti iti yujyate

original: asphuṭāgrahaṇe kāmam mā bhasi sphuṭam ātmanā /
analyzed: a sphuṭa a grahaṇe kāmam mā bhasi sphuṭam ātmanā

original: avidyamāne tv adhyasye vaiśvarūpyaṃ vṛthākṛtam // MVibhr_33 //
analyzed: a vidyamāne tu adhyasye vaiśvarūpyam vṛthākṛtam

original: citau vicitrākārāyāṃ prapañcātmatayaiva hi /
analyzed: citau vicitra ākārāyām prapañca ātma tayā eva hi

original: anirmokṣas tathā ca syād athavānityatāpatet // MVibhr_34 //
analyzed: anirmokṣaḥ tathā ca syāt athavā anitya tā āpatet

original: anekākāravibhrāntau gandharvanagarādiṣu /
analyzed: aneka ākāra vibhrāntau gandharvanagara ādiṣu

original: ākārā vyaktam ekasyā dhiyo 'satyāś cakāsati // MVibhr_35 //
analyzed: ākārāḥ vyaktam ekasyāḥ dhiyaḥ satyāḥ cakāsati

original: na bhūtaṃ cetaso rūpaṃ nādhyāropāsphuṭagrahau /
analyzed: na bhūtam cetasaḥ rūpam na adhyāropa asphuṭa grahau

original: vibhrameṣu vivartatvam ato brahmavidāṃ matam // MVibhr_36 //
analyzed: vibhrameṣu vivarta tvam atas brahma vidām matam

original: asato bhāsanāyogād virodhāt saṃvido 'paraḥ /
analyzed: asataḥ bhāsana ayogāt virodhāt saṃvidaḥ paraḥ

original: avocan nipuṇaṃmanyo vibhramaṃ samyagagraham // MVibhr_37 //
analyzed: avocat nipuṇaṃmanyaḥ vibhramam samyak agraham

original: na kiñcid bhāsate ceti viruddham iva dṛśyate /
analyzed: na kiñcid bhāsate ca iti viruddham iva dṛśyate

original: bhāsane rūpavattvena nāsat saṃvidvirodhataḥ // MVibhr_38 //
analyzed: bhāsane rūpavat tvena nā asat saṃvid virodhataḥ

original: anyasyāpy anyathā khyātir ata eva na yujyate /
analyzed: anyasya api anyathā khyātiḥ atas eva na yujyate

original: anyat prakāśate cānyad grāhyam ity atidurghaṭam // MVibhr_39 //
analyzed: anyat prakāśate ca anyat grāhyam iti ati durghaṭam

original: ālambanaṃ na hetutvamātrād akṣe 'pi tad yataḥ /
analyzed: ālambanam na hetu tva mātrāt akṣe tat yatas

original: ālambanaṃ na hetutvamātreṇa vyavatiṣṭhate // MVibhr_40 //
analyzed: ālambanam na hetu tva mātreṇa vyavatiṣṭhate

original: yady ālambanarūpāc ca dhīr anyad avabhāsate /
analyzed: yadi ālambana rūpāt ca dhīḥ anyat avabhāsate

original: tato 'nālambanaiva syāt tasya tallakṣaṇacyuteḥ // MVibhr_41 //
analyzed: tatas nā ālambanā eva syāt tasya tad lakṣaṇa cyuteḥ

original: tathā ca tatsvabhāvāyā nārthatattvaviniścayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca tad svabhāvāyāḥ na artha tattva viniścayaḥ

original: sāpekṣāyā api grāhyahīnā sā ced avedikā // MVibhr_42 //
analyzed: sāpekṣāyāḥ api grāhya hīnā sā ced a vedikā

original: smṛtitvāśaṅkayā nātra vartamāne na niścayaḥ /
analyzed: smṛti tva āśaṅkayā nā atra vartamāne na niścayaḥ

original: vivekāgrahaṇaṃ yasmād dhetubhāve na yujyate // MVibhr_44 //
analyzed: viveka agrahaṇam yasmāt hetu bhāve na yujyate

original: hetūpaghāte khalu tat tadabhāve sphuṭagrahaḥ /
analyzed: hetu upaghāte khalu tat tad abhāve sphuṭa grahaḥ

original: yatnenānupalabdheś ca tadabhāve ca niścayaḥ // MVibhr_45 //
analyzed: yatnena anupalabdheḥ ca tad abhāve ca niścayaḥ

original: sadṛśādṛṣṭacintādyāḥ smṛtibījasya bodhakāḥ /
analyzed: sadṛśa adṛṣṭa cintā ādyāḥ smṛti bījasya bodhakāḥ

original: smarāmīti ca pramoṣāt prāyeṇādhyakṣavibhramaḥ // MVibhr_46 //
analyzed: smarāmi iti ca pramoṣāt prāyeṇa adhyakṣa vibhramaḥ

original: iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ //
analyzed: iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: ekāntasattve kā bhrāntir asattve kiṃ prakāśatām /
analyzed: ekānta sattve kā bhrāntiḥ asattve kim prakāśatām

original: dvayānuguṇyād vṛddhānāṃ saṃmatā khyātir anyathā // MVibhr_47 //
analyzed: dvaya ānuguṇyāt vṛddhānām saṃmatā khyātiḥ anyathā

original: yatra na prathate kiñcit tatra tāvan na vibhramaḥ /
analyzed: yatra na prathate kiñcid tatra tāvat na vibhramaḥ

original: suṣuptāv iva bhūcchāyā tamo bhāvo yathekṣyate // MVibhr_48 //
analyzed: suṣuptau iva bhū chāyā tamaḥ bhāvaḥ yathā īkṣyate

original: dvayor ekasya vā khyātir asamyag vibhramo mataḥ /
analyzed: dvayoḥ ekasya vā khyātiḥ asamyak vibhramaḥ mataḥ

original: tatra keyam asamyaktā vijñānastham apāṭavam // MVibhr_49 //
analyzed: tatra kā iyam asamyaktā vijñāna stham apāṭavam

original: atha sarvaprakārāṇām agrahaḥ kasyacid grahaḥ /
analyzed: atha sarva prakārāṇām a grahaḥ kasyacid grahaḥ

original: vastuno 'tatprakārasya tathā khyātis tu neṣyate // MVibhr_50 //
analyzed: tad prakārasya tathā khyātiḥ tu nā iṣyate

original: tatra dūrasthite sūkṣme bhavaty apaṭudarśanam /
analyzed: tatra dūra sthite sūkṣme bhavati apaṭu darśanam

original: sāmānyamātrakhyātir vā na bhramaś ca pratīyate // MVibhr_51 //
analyzed: sāmānya mātra khyātiḥ vā na bhramaḥ ca pratīyate

original: na ca sarvātmanārthasya jñānaṃ kiñcana bodhakaṃ /
analyzed: na ca sarva ātmanā arthasya jñānam kiñcana bodhakam

original: sarvavijñānamithyātvam āpannaṃ punar anyathā // MVibhr_52 //
analyzed: sarva vijñāna mithyātvam āpannam punar anyathā

original: ato nāvartamānatvājñānāt svapnamatir mṛṣā /
analyzed: atas na āvartamāna tva ajñānāt svapna matiḥ mṛṣā

original: vartamānatvabodhāt tu tathaikatvādhiropaṇāt // MVibhr_53 //
analyzed: vartamāna tva bodhāt tu tathā ekatva adhiropaṇāt

original: mithyā rajatadhīr nātra vivekānavadhāraṇāt /
analyzed: mithyā rajata dhīḥ na atra viveka anavadhāraṇāt

original: pratyabhijñānavibhrāntau na smṛtitvaṃ na gamyate // MVibhr_54 //
analyzed: pratyabhijñāna vibhrāntau na smṛti tvam na gamyate

original: ekasya ca viviktatvād itarasya viviktatā /
analyzed: ekasya ca vivikta tvāt itarasya vivikta tā

original: pratyakṣād avivekāc ca yuktaḥ pratyakṣavibhramaḥ // MVibhr_55 //
analyzed: pratyakṣāt avivekāt ca yuktaḥ pratyakṣa vibhramaḥ

original: syāt smṛtād avivekāc ca smṛtigocaravibhramaḥ /
analyzed: syāt smṛtāt avivekāt ca smṛti gocara vibhramaḥ

original: niyatā na pravṛttiḥ syān neṣṭā cet khyātir anyathā // MVibhr_57 //
analyzed: niyatā na pravṛttiḥ syāt na iṣṭā ced khyātiḥ anyathā

original: na dṛśyādṛśyayor bhedaḥ khyātiś cen nepsitātmanaḥ /
analyzed: na dṛśya adṛśyayoḥ bhedaḥ khyātiḥ ced na īpsita ātmanaḥ

original: nanu no viparītārthā dhīḥ pratītivirodhataḥ // MVibhr_58 //
analyzed: nanu no viparīta arthā dhīḥ pratīti virodhataḥ

original: anāśvāsāc ca rajatapratyayo rajate smṛtiḥ /
analyzed: anāśvāsāt ca rajata pratyayaḥ rajate smṛtiḥ

original: naitan na hi pravarteta śuktikāśakale tadā // MVibhr_59 //
analyzed: na etat na hi pravarteta śuktikā śakale tadā

original: rajate sā pravṛttiś cen na tasyāsaṃnidhānataḥ /
analyzed: rajate sā pravṛttiḥ ced na tasya asaṃnidhānataḥ

original: asaṃnidhānābodhāc cet pravṛttiniyamaḥ kutaḥ // MVibhr_60 //
analyzed: asaṃnidhāna abodhāt ced pravṛtti niyamaḥ kutas

original: pravartate yat tatraiva tat tatsaṃnidhikāritam /
analyzed: pravartate yat tatra eva tat tad saṃnidhi kāritam

original: anyatra bhedagrahaṇād vivekāgrahaṇāt tathā // MVibhr_61 //
analyzed: anyatra bheda grahaṇāt viveka agrahaṇāt tathā

original: pravṛttibhedaḥ sādṛśyād vivekāgrahaṇaṃ yadi /
analyzed: pravṛtti bhedaḥ sādṛśyāt viveka agrahaṇam yadi

original: adṛṣṭeṣu pravarteta loṣṭādiṣv avivekataḥ // MVibhr_62 //
analyzed: adṛṣṭeṣu pravarteta loṣṭa ādiṣu avivekataḥ

original: na tatra yadi tadbuddhiḥ śuktikāśakale 'pi na /
analyzed: na tatra yadi tad buddhiḥ śuktikā śakale pi na

original: athāsti viparītārthā khyātir nihnūyate katham // MVibhr_63 //
analyzed: atha asti viparīta arthā khyātiḥ nihnūyate katham

original: adṛṣṭatvād apravṛttiḥ śuktikāśakale samā /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa tvāt apravṛttiḥ śuktikā śakale samā

original: dṛṣṭaṃ tad yena rūpeṇa tat pravṛtter akāraṇam // MVibhr_64 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam tat yena rūpeṇa tat pravṛtteḥ akāraṇam

original: dṛṣṭasmṛtāvivekāc ced idam atra parīkṣyatām /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa smṛta avivekāt ced idam atra parīkṣyatām

original: tattvabodhād apātatvabodhād rajatavedanāt // MVibhr_65 //
analyzed: tattva bodhāt apāta tva bodhāt rajata vedanāt

original: dṛṣṭe pravṛttiḥ pūrvasmin viparītārthatā mateḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭe pravṛttiḥ pūrvasmin viparīta artha tā mateḥ

original: na dṛṣṭādṛṣṭayor bhedaḥ parasmin nopayoginī // MVibhr_66 //
analyzed: na dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭayoḥ bhedaḥ parasmin na upayoginī

original: khayogadarśane te hi samāropopayoginī /
analyzed: kha yoga darśane te hi samāropa upayoginī

original: nādṛṣṭe 'saṃprayukte vā cākṣuṣaḥ syād viparyayaḥ // MVibhr_67 //
analyzed: na adṛṣṭe saṃprayukte vā cākṣuṣaḥ syāt viparyayaḥ

original: smṛtipramāṇaphalayor nānātvaṃ yadi ceṣyate /
analyzed: smṛti pramāṇa phalayoḥ nānātvam yadi ca iṣyate

original: vivecitas tayos svārtho 'vivekaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ // MVibhr_68 //
analyzed: vivecitaḥ tayoḥ svārthaḥ vivekaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ

original: anyasmāt sā svaviṣayaṃ vivinakti smṛtir na cet /
analyzed: anyasmāt sā sva viṣayam vivinakti smṛtiḥ na ced

original: sāmānyadṛṣṭau cānyasya smṛtau syād vā sadā bhramaḥ // MVibhr_69 //
analyzed: sāmānya dṛṣṭau ca anyasya smṛtau syāt vā sadā bhramaḥ

original: smarāmīti vivekān na yadi naitat prakalpate /
analyzed: smarāmi iti vivekāt na yadi nā etat prakalpate

original: phalābhede phalonneyajñānabhedamatiḥ kutaḥ // MVibhr_70 //
analyzed: phala abhede phala unneya jñāna bheda matiḥ kutas

original: smarāmīti ca vijñānaṃ smṛter anyad udāhṛtam /
analyzed: smarāmi iti ca vijñānam smṛteḥ anyat udāhṛtam

original: na ca mānaphalād bhinnā tat siddhyati phalād ṛte // MVibhr_71 //
analyzed: na ca māna phalāt bhinnā tat siddhi ati phalāt ṛte

original: manodoṣād yadi svārtho na smṛtyā pravivicyate /
analyzed: manaḥ doṣāt yadi sva arthaḥ na smṛtyā pravivicyate

original: timirādau kathaṃ svasthe svānte keśādivibhramaḥ // MVibhr_72 //
analyzed: timira ādau katham svasthe svānte keśa ādi vibhramaḥ

original: na tatrāpi mano duṣṭam arthāntaravivecanāt /
analyzed: na tatra api manaḥ duṣṭam artha antara vivecanāt

original: jñānād eva hi dṛṣṭatvakalpanāyāś ca gauravāt // MVibhr_73 //
analyzed: jñānāt eva hi dṛṣṭa tva kalpanāyāḥ ca gauravāt

original: budhyamāno vivekaṃ ca paśyāmīndriyadoṣataḥ /
analyzed: budhyamānaḥ vivekam ca paśyāmi indriya doṣataḥ

original: citrādirūpān dīpādīn iti lokaḥ prabhāṣate // MVibhr_74 //
analyzed: citra ādi rūpān dīpa ādīn iti lokaḥ prabhāṣate

original: indriyāṇāṃ doṣabhedān niyatabhrāntidarśanam /
analyzed: indriyāṇām doṣa bhedāt niyata bhrānti darśanam

original: na syād yasyāgrahe doṣavyāpāra iti niścayaḥ // MVibhr_75 //
analyzed: na syāt yasya agrahe doṣa vyāpāraḥ iti niścayaḥ

original: na ca sarvā niyogena bhrāntiḥ sādṛśyabandhanā /
analyzed: na ca sarvā niyogena bhrāntiḥ sādṛśya bandhanā

original: śvete pītabhramo dṛṣṭo madhure tiktavibhramaḥ // MVibhr_76 //
analyzed: śvete pīta bhramaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ madhure tikta vibhramaḥ

original: avyāpṛtau ca tatprāpter nātaḥpittapravedanam /
analyzed: avyāpṛtau ca tad prāpteḥ na atas pitta pravedanam

original: atyāsannasya saṃvittir durlabhā cāñjanādivat // MVibhr_77 //
analyzed: ati āsannasya saṃvittiḥ durlabhā ca añjana ādi vat

original: na cākṣavṛttitajjanmajñānabhedāvivekajāḥ /
analyzed: na ca akṣa vṛtti tad janma jñāna bheda aviveka jāḥ

original: dvicandrādibhramās te hi na pratyakṣe na ca smṛte // MVibhr_78 //
analyzed: dvi candra ādi bhramāḥ te hi na pratyakṣe na ca smṛte

original: anyathālambanatve ca na nirālambanā matiḥ /
analyzed: anyathā ālambana tve ca na nirālambanā matiḥ

original: anyenāpi hi rūpeṇa cakṣur nālambate 'kṣadhīḥ // MVibhr_79 //
analyzed: anyena api hi rūpeṇa cakṣuḥ na ālambate kṣadhīḥ

original: ālambanārthas tadyuktavyavahārasya yogyatā /
anyasyāpi hi naivānyas sa ity eva hi darśitam // MVibhr_80 //
analyzed: anyasya api hi na eva anyaḥ saḥ iti eva hi darśitam

original: pravṛttiś śuktiśakale tathā ca rajatārthinaḥ /
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ śuktiśakale tathā ca rajata arthinaḥ

original: ābhāsate kathañcic ca tan nātyantaṃ na bhāsate // MVibhr_81 //
analyzed: ābhāsate kathañcid ca tat na atyantam na bhāsate

original: tena nāveādikā yat tu tadrūpāvyabhicārataḥ /
analyzed: tena na āveādikā yat tu tad rūpa avyabhicārataḥ

original: prāmāṇyam ānapekṣyaṃ hi syād anyathā trapākaram // MVibhr_82 //
analyzed: prāmāṇyam ānapekṣyam hi syāt anyathā trapā karam

original: trapākaraṃ kathaṃ tan naḥ svataḥprāmāṇyavādinām /
analyzed: trapā karam katham tat naḥ svatas prāmāṇya vādinām

original: apy anyo 'vyabhicāreṇa dhīprāmāṇyam upāgamat // MVibhr_83 //
analyzed: api anyaḥ vyabhicāreṇa dhī prāmāṇyam upāgamat

original: bodhād eva pramāṇatvam iti mīmāṃsakasthitim /
analyzed: bodhāt eva pramāṇa tvam iti mīmāṃsaka sthitim

original: vidann avyabhicāreṇa tāṃ vyudasyaty apaṇḍitaḥ // MVibhr_84 //
analyzed: vidan avyabhicāreṇa tām vyudasyati apaṇḍitaḥ

original: arthenāvyabhicāraś cen nābuddhena pramīyate /
analyzed: arthena avyabhicāraḥ ced na a buddhena pramīyate

original: jñānasyāvyabhicārāc ca tadbodha iti durghaṭam // MVibhr_85 //
analyzed: jñānasya avyabhicārāt ca tad bodhaḥ iti durghaṭam

original: upāsyo 'vyatirekaś ca tajjñānasya tathānyathā /
analyzed: upāsyaḥ vyatirekaḥ ca tad jñānasya tathā anyathā

original: nāsiddhāvyatirekeṇa sa parāmṛśyate .......... // MVibhr_86 //
analyzed: na asiddha avyatirekeṇa sa parāmṛśyate

original: api cāvyatireko 'pi jñānarūpeṇa vedyate /
analyzed: api ca avyatirekaḥ jñāna rūpeṇa vedyate

original: khyātau ca viparītāyāṃ tadvirodhaprasaṅgataḥ // MVibhr_87 //
analyzed: khyātau ca viparītāyām tad virodha prasaṅgataḥ

original: tathā sati tad evāstu viṣayasyāvabodhakam /
analyzed: tathā sati tat eva astu viṣayasya avabodhakam

original: artho nāvyatirekeṇa tatsāmarthyāptasaṃvidā // MVibhr_88 //
analyzed: arthaḥ na a vyatirekeṇa tad sāmarthya āpta saṃvidā

original: vyabhicārāpratītyā ced aprāmāṇyanirākṛtiḥ /
dūṣite vyabhicāreṇa na syāj jñāne pramāṇatā // MVibhr_89 //
analyzed: dūṣite vyabhicāreṇa na syāt jñāne pramāṇa tā

original: naitad avyabhicāreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ yasya duṣyati /
analyzed: na etat avyabhicāreṇa prāmāṇyam yasya duṣyati

original: vyabhicārād asau liṅgaṃ yathā nākṣaṃ tathāpi tat // MVibhr_90 //
analyzed: vyabhicārāt asau liṅgam yathā na akṣam tathā api tat

original: saṃbandhajñānasāpekṣaṃ yad upaity upayogitām /
analyzed: saṃbandha jñāna sāpekṣam yat upaiti upayogi tām

original: dūṣitaṃ vyabhicāreṇa tat syāt saṃśayakāraṇam // MVibhr_91 //
analyzed: dūṣitam vyabhicāreṇa tat syāt saṃśaya kāraṇam

original: duṣyati vyabhicāreṇa bodhakaṃ sattayaiva na /
analyzed: duṣyati vyabhicāreṇa bodhakam sattayā eva na

original: vijñānāc cārthasaṃvittis sattayaivendriyādivat // MVibhr_92 //
analyzed: vijñānāt ca artha saṃvittiḥ sattayā evā indriya ādi vat

original: liṅgasyāvyabhicārād yat prāpyate rūpato 'sya tat /
analyzed: liṅgasya avyabhicārāt yat prāpyate tat

original: siddhapratyayasāmarthyapūrvau neto nimittatām // MVibhr_93 //
analyzed: siddha pratyaya sāmarthya pūrvau na itas nimitta tām

original: prāmāṇye tadabhāve cāvyatirekaviparyayau /
analyzed: prāmāṇye tad abhāve ca avyatireka viparyayau

original: tathā hy avyatireko 'pi bodhād evopavarṇitaḥ // MVibhr_94 //
analyzed: tathā hi avyatirekaḥ bodhāt eva upavarṇitaḥ

original: vyatireko bādhabodhād iti tacchrutiyuktatā /
analyzed: vyatirekaḥ bādha bodhāt iti tad śruti yukta tā

original: asiddhe jñānasāmarthye so 'siddho dūṣakaḥ katham // MVibhr_95 //
analyzed: asiddhe jñāna sāmarthye saḥ siddhaḥ dūṣakaḥ katham

original: siddhe 'pi siddhasāmarthyam asāmarthyaṃ kathaṃ nayet /
analyzed: siddhe siddha sāmarthyam a sāmarthyam katham nayet

original: nanu ca vyabhicāritve bādhakajñānasaṃmate // MVibhr_96 //
analyzed: nanu ca vyabhicāri tve bādhaka jñāna saṃmate

original: jñānarūpasya tenaiva vihanyeta pramāṇatā /
analyzed: jñāna rūpasya tena eva vihanyeta pramāṇa tā

original: artho yathā jñānarūpāt tathaivety avasīyate // MVibhr_97 //
analyzed: arthaḥ yathā jñāna rūpāt tathā evā iti avasīyate

original: vyabhicāramater eva na tathaiveti gamyate /
analyzed: vyabhicāra mateḥ eva na tathā evā iti gamyate

original: tat satyaṃ bādhakajñānaṃ yatra tatra vihanyate // MVibhr_98 //
analyzed: tat satyam bādhaka jñānam yatra tatra vihanyate

original: anyatra tu vighātaḥ syān na sākṣān nāpi cārthataḥ /
analyzed: anyatra tu vighātaḥ syāt na sākṣāt na api ca arthataḥ

original: anumānaṃ bhavet tac ca tenāpahṛtagocaram // MVibhr_99 //
analyzed: anumānam bhavet tat ca tena apahṛta gocaram

original: nodeti jāgrato buddhir iti bhāṣye nidarśitam /
analyzed: na udeti jāgrataḥ buddhiḥ iti bhāṣye nidarśitam

original: vyabhicārajñānamātrāt prāmāṇyasya na naḥ kṣatiḥ // MVibhr_100 //
analyzed: vyabhicāra jñāna mātrāt prāmāṇyasya na naḥ kṣatiḥ

original: vyabhicāriṇi nāśvāsaḥ ........ /
analyzed: vyabhicāriṇi na āśvāsaḥ

original: tridhāpi vyabhicāreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ nopahanyate /
analyzed: tridhā api vyabhicāreṇa prāmāṇyam nā upahanyate

original: uktaṃ nāvyatirekasya pramāṇatvanimittatā // MVibhr_102 //
analyzed: uktam na avyatirekasya pramāṇa tva nimitta tā

original: yena syād dhetvabhāvena vyabhicāre viparyayaḥ /
analyzed: yena syāt hetu abhāvena vyabhicāre viparyayaḥ

original: dhūmādīnām api na tad varṇyate 'vyabhicārataḥ // MVibhr_103 //
analyzed: dhūma ādīnām api na tat varṇyate vyabhicārataḥ

original: bodhād eva tadutpattāv aṅgabhāvo 'sya sammataḥ /
analyzed: bodhāt eva tad utpattau aṅga bhāvaḥ sammataḥ

original: tathā hy avyabhicārāṇāṃ kutaścana nimittataḥ // MVibhr_104 //
analyzed: tathā hi avyabhicārāṇām kutaścana nimittataḥ

original: bodhasyānudaye kaścit prāmāṇyaṃ nānumanyate /
analyzed: bodhasya anudaye kaścid prāmāṇyam na anumanyate

original: ekārthaniyataṃ bodhaṃ janayad vyabhicāry api // MVibhr_105 //
analyzed: eka artha niyatam bodham janayat vyabhicāri api

original: pramāṇam iṣyate cakṣur nīle bhāve site bhavat /
analyzed: pramāṇam iṣyate cakṣuḥ nīle bhāve site bhavat

original: na cāpi vyabhicārasya sākṣāt prāmāṇyaghātitā // MVibhr_106 //
analyzed: na ca api vyabhicārasya sākṣāt prāmāṇya ghāti tā

original: kvacid dṛṣṭā bhrāntibodhe bādhadhīr upaghātikā /
analyzed: kvacid dṛṣṭā bhrānti bodhe bādha dhīḥ upaghātikā

original: prameyatvordhvatādīnāṃ bodha evāvadhārakaḥ // MVibhr_107 //
nāstīti na pramāṇatvaṃ hetvabhāvāc ca nāsty asau /
analyzed: na asti iti na pramāṇa tvam hetu abhāvāt ca na asti asau

original: tadbhāvāc ca pramāṇatvam akṣāṇāṃ vyabhicāriṇām // MVibhr_108 //
analyzed: tad bhāvāt ca pramāṇa tvam akṣāṇām vyabhicāriṇām

original: na cāvadhārite yukto dvaividhyāt saṃśayodbhavaḥ /
analyzed: na ca avadhārite yuktaḥ dvaividhyāt saṃśaya udbhavaḥ

original: na niścite 'pi hi sthāṇāv ūrdhvatvena viśerate // MVibhr_109 // ........ ........ /
analyzed: na niścite hi sthāṇau ūrdhva tvena viśerate

original: na cāvadhāraṇād eva tattvato 'navadhāraṇam // MVibhr_110 //
analyzed: na ca avadhāraṇāt eva tattvataḥ nava dhāraṇam

original: evaṃ yatas tato naivaṃ bhaved atisubhāṣitam /
analyzed: evam yatas tatas nā evam bhavet ati su bhāṣitam

original: utpattyaiva ca vijñānaṃ tathātvasyāvadhārakam // MVibhr_111 //
analyzed: utpattyā eva ca vijñānam tathātvasya avadhārakam

original: na cet tathā nānyato 'pi tasya prāmāṇyasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: na ced tathā tasya prāmāṇya sambhavaḥ

original: pramāṇatvāpramāṇatve 'vyatirekaviparyayau // MVibhr_112 //
analyzed: pramāṇa tva apramāṇa tve vyatireka viparyayau

original: anaṅge iti moghaiva tayor atra vicāraṇā /
analyzed: anaṅge iti moghā eva tayoḥ atra vicāraṇā

original: ato 'vadhāraṇābhāsavyabhicārāt parīkṣaṇam // MVibhr_113 //
analyzed: atas va dhāraṇa ābhāsa vyabhicārāt parīkṣaṇam
prastutya

original: hetvabhāve phalābhāvaniyamo syāt tato gate // MVibhr_114 //
analyzed: hetu abhāve syāt tatas gate

original: abhāve hetudoṣāṇāṃ tathākhyātiviniścayaḥ /
analyzed: abhāve hetu doṣāṇām tathā khyāti viniścayaḥ

original: hetau phalaṃ na niyataṃ pariṇāmādyapekṣiṇi // MVibhr_115 //
analyzed: hetau phalam na niyatam pariṇāma ādi apekṣiṇi

original: aduṣṭe 'pi tato hetau na sphuṭagrahaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: aduṣṭe tatas hetau na sphuṭa graha niścayaḥ

original: pratyakṣo 'nubhavaḥ sādhyo na hetor vyabhicāriṇaḥ // MVibhr_116 //
analyzed: pratyakṣaḥ nubhavaḥ sādhyaḥ na hetoḥ vyabhicāriṇaḥ

original: viparyayaphalābhāvo hetvabhāvāt tu yujyate /
analyzed: viparyaya phala abhāvaḥ hetu abhāvāt tu yujyate

original: nirodhād yuktakāryasya viparītasya sādhanāt // MVibhr_117 //
analyzed: nirodhāt yukta kāryasya viparītasya sādhanāt

original: doṣāṇāṃ nitarāṃ doṣabhāvo 'bhivyaktim ṛcchati /
analyzed: doṣāṇām nitarām doṣa bhāvaḥ bhivyaktim ṛcchati

original: kāryātireko jaṭhare vahnau dṛṣṭaś ca bhasmake // MVibhr_118 //
analyzed: kārya atirekaḥ jaṭhare vahnau dṛṣṭaḥ ca bhasmake

original: kāmādyupaplute citte dṛṣṭitā smaraṇātmani /
analyzed: kāma ādi upaplute citte dṛṣṭi tā smaraṇa ātmani

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyenāmukhyarūpya pratītitaḥ // MVibhr_119 //
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyena amukhya rūpya pratītitaḥ

original: abhinnaikā ca sā saṃvit kaṃ pakṣam apabadhatām /
analyzed: abhinnā ekā ca sā saṃvid kam pakṣam apabadhatām

original: śūnyaṃ prakāśate ceti dvayaṃ vipratiṣedhavat // MVibhr_120 //
analyzed: śūnyam prakāśate ca iti dvayam vipratiṣedhavat

original: bhāsane rūpavattvena śūnyaivocyeta śūnyatā /
analyzed: bhāsane rūpavat tvena śūnyā evā ucyeta śūnyatā

original: sarvarūpaviveko hi śūnyam ity abhibhāṣyate // MVibhr_121 //
analyzed: sarva rūpa vivekaḥ hi śūnyam iti abhibhāṣyate

original: parai rūpābhyupagame tatra śūnyaiva śūnyadhīḥ /
analyzed: paraiḥ rūpa abhyupagame tatra śūnyā eva śūnya dhīḥ

original: abhāvo bhāvarūpeṇa bhātīti yadi manyate // MVibhr_122 //
analyzed: abhāvaḥ bhāva rūpeṇa bhāti iti yadi manyate

original: anyathā khyātir eveṣṭā śūnyaṃ tad api cen matam /
analyzed: anyathā khyātiḥ evā iṣṭā śūnyam tat api ced matam

original: naitad vipratiṣidhyete śūnyatābhāvarūpate // MVibhr_123 //
analyzed: na etat vipratiṣidhyete śūnyatā bhāva rūpate

original: ato 'taddeśakālatvamātraṃ tasyeha śūnyatā /
analyzed: tad deśa kāla tva mātram tasya iha śūnyatā

original: nanv asti yad yathā vastu tathā khyātau na vibhramaḥ // MVibhr_124 //
analyzed: nanu asti yat yathā vastu tathā khyātau na vibhramaḥ

original: na yathāsti tathā khyātau śūnyakhyāter na mucyate /
analyzed: na yathā asti tathā khyātau śūnya khyāteḥ na mucyate

original: kecid āhuḥ prakāribhyaḥ prakārā na cakāsati // MVibhr_125 //
analyzed: kecid āhuḥ prakāribhyaḥ prakārāḥ na cakāsati

original: viviktās te tathā bhānti te ca santa iti sthitiḥ /
analyzed: viviktāḥ te tathā bhānti te ca santaḥ iti sthitiḥ

original: anye tanmātraśūnyatvaṃ manvate nānyathā bhramaḥ // MVibhr_126 //
analyzed: anye tanmātra śūnya tvam manvate na anyathā bhramaḥ

original: nānyathā dhīr vastuniṣṭhā vastvālambād vinā na sā /
analyzed: nā anyathā dhīḥ vastu niṣṭhā vastu ālambāt vinā na sā

original: svayaṃ tu vārttikakṛtā samādhir iha varṇitaḥ // MVibhr_127 //
analyzed: svayam tu vārttikakṛtā samādhiḥ iha varṇitaḥ

original: bhāvāntaram abhāvo 'nyo na kaścid anirūpaṇāt /
analyzed: bhāva antaram abhāvaḥ nyaḥ na kaścid anirūpaṇāt

original: satyaṃ yathāsti na tathā bhāsane vibhramo mataḥ // MVibhr_128 //
analyzed: satyam yathā asti na tathā bhāsane vibhramaḥ mataḥ

original: na yenāsti prakāreṇa na tu tucchaḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: na yena asti prakāreṇa na tu tucchaḥ pratīyate

original: tathā katham abhāvyo 'sya sa hi bhāti tathā ca saḥ // MVibhr_129 //
analyzed: tathā katham sa hi bhāti tathā ca saḥ

original: bhāvāntaram abhāvo hi kayācit tu vyapekṣayā /
analyzed: bhāva antaram abhāvaḥ hi kayācid tu vyapekṣayā

original: anyathākhyātipakṣe ca na prakārāntaraṃ na sat // MVibhr_130 //
analyzed: anyathā khyāti pakṣe ca na prakāra antaram na sat

original: anyasya ca na tasyeti khyātir yuktā mṛṣā ca sā /
analyzed: anyasya ca na tasya iti khyātiḥ yuktā mṛṣā ca sā

original: prakārāntarasaṃsargo nanv asann eva bhāsate // MVibhr_131 //
saṃvedyaṃ nanyarupatvam anyasya .............. /
analyzed: saṃvedyam na nya rupa tvam anyasya

original: bhinnayor atra saṃsargo na kaścid avabhāsate // MVibhr_132 //
analyzed: bhinnayoḥ atra saṃsargaḥ na kaścid avabhāsate

original: anyātmanāparakhyātiḥ sa cābhāve 'sya tan mṛṣā /
analyzed: anya ātmanā apara khyātiḥ sa ca abhāve tat mṛṣā

original: abhāvagrāhiṇī buddhir bhāvāntaram upāśritā // MVibhr_133 //
analyzed: abhāva grāhiṇī buddhiḥ bhāva antaram upāśritā

original: tadanyasmāt pṛthaktvena nirupākhyo na vidyate /
analyzed: tad anyasmāt pṛthaktvena nirupākhyaḥ na vidyate

original: ato bhāvāntaraṃ muktvā tatrābhāvānirūpaṇāt // MVibhr_134 //
analyzed: atas bhāva antaram muktvā tatra abhāva anirūpaṇāt

original: na buddhyā bhāvaśūnyatvaṃ mṛṣā ceti vipaścitaḥ /
analyzed: na buddhyā bhāva śūnya tvam mṛṣā ca iti vipaścitaḥ

original: na vai śaśaviṣāṇe 'pi khyātasya nirupākhyatā // MVibhr_135 //
analyzed: na vai śaśaviṣāṇe pi khyātasya nirupākhya tā

original: śaśasaṃsargirūpaṃ hi viṣāṇaṃ tatra gamyate /
analyzed: śaśa saṃsargi rūpam hi viṣāṇam tatra gamyate

original: avastu tac ca no yena khuradharmiṇi vīkṣitam // MVibhr_136 //
analyzed: avastu tat ca naḥ yena khuradharmiṇi vīkṣitam

original: asaṃsṛṣṭasya so 'bhāva iti khyātir mṛṣā ca sā /
analyzed: asaṃsṛṣṭasya saḥ bhāvaḥ iti khyātiḥ mṛṣā ca sā

original: aṅgulyagre hastiyūtham ity eṣā pratibhā tathā // MVibhr_137 //
analyzed: aṅguli agre hasti yūtham iti eṣā pratibhā tathā

original: svapne 'py avartamānasya grahaṇaṃ vartamānavat /
analyzed: svapne pi a vartamānasya grahaṇam vartamāna vat

original: nāviśeṣaḥ khapuṣpāc ca svakāle tasya vastutā // MVibhr_138 //
analyzed: na aviśeṣaḥ khapuṣpāt ca sva kāle tasya vastu tā

original: tatkālam eva hi jñeyaṃ jñānam eva tu saṃprati /
analyzed: tad kālam eva hi jñeyam jñānam eva tu saṃprati

original: vartamānatvam apy atra dṛṣṭam anyatra rūpyate // MVibhr_139 //
analyzed: vartamāna tvam api atra dṛṣṭam anyatra rūpyate

original: anyasyāpy anyathā dṛṣṭiḥ parasparavirodhinām /
analyzed: anyasya api anyathā dṛṣṭiḥ paraspara virodhinām

original: atyantānanubhūtatvam asti tatkāritaṃ yataḥ // MVibhr_140 //
analyzed: atyanta ananubhūta tvam asti tat kāritam yatas

original: na jñeyaśūnyaṃ vijñānaṃ svātmahāniprasaṅgataḥ /
analyzed: na jñeya śūnyam vijñānam sva ātma hāni prasaṅgataḥ

original: nirupākhyād ātmayogād asvātantryāc ca cetasaḥ // MVibhr_141 //
analyzed: nirupākhyāt ātma yogāt asvātantryāt ca cetasaḥ

original: pramāṇavanty adṛṣṭāni kalpyante subahūny api /
analyzed: pramāṇavanti adṛṣṭāni kalpyante su bahūni api

original: saṃskāracchedahetūnāṃ tattvaṃ naikāntataḥ sthitam // MVibhr_142 //
analyzed: saṃskāra cheda hetūnām tattvam na ekāntataḥ sthitam

original: janmāntarānubhūtaṃ ca na smaryata iti sthitam /
analyzed: janma antara anubhūtam ca na smaryate iti sthitam

original: tatkarmaphalasaṃbandhaṃ pratīti pratijānate // MVibhr_143 //
analyzed: tad karma phala saṃbandham prati iti pratijānate

original: tathā hy anādau saṃsāre karmabhedān smarann api /
analyzed: tathā hi anādau saṃsāre karma bhedān smaran api

original: anantakṛtakarmatvāt ko vidyāt kasya kiṃ phalam // MVibhr_144 //
analyzed: ananta kṛta karma tvāt kaḥ vidyāt kasya kim phalam

original: svāntasyopaplavaḥ svapne smṛtibījasya bodhakaḥ /
analyzed: svāntasya upaplavaḥ svapne smṛti bījasya bodhakaḥ

original: tasya ca jagrato 'bhāvān nodeti svapnadarśanam // MVibhr_145 //
analyzed: tasya ca jagrataḥ bhāvāt na udeti svapna darśanam

original: kāmādyupaplave 'py evaṃ kāryādhikyam udāhṛtam /
analyzed: kāma ādi upaplave pi evam kārya ādhikyam udāhṛtam

original: agrāhyam eva gṛhṇāti svayaṃ kalpayati hy ayam // MVibhr_146 //
analyzed: a grāhyam eva gṛhṇāti svayam kalpayati hi ayam

original: doṣakṣatasya manasas tat kāryaṃ ................. /
analyzed: doṣa kṣatasya manasaḥ tat kāryam

original: tad adhyārope no gauṇī tathety adhyavasāyataḥ // MVibhr_147 //
analyzed: tat adhyārope no gauṇī tathā iti adhyavasāyataḥ

original: khyāti sannihite 'śūnyaṃ sad bhāvāntaraghaṭṭitam /
analyzed: khyāti sannihite śūnyam sat bhāva antara ghaṭṭitam

original: prabhāsatām asattā tu no śūnyaṃ tad anātmakam // MVibhr_148 //
analyzed: prabhāsatām asattā tu no śūnyam tat anātmakam

original: evaṃ nirvacanīyā ca nāvidyā parihāsyate /
analyzed: evam nirvacanīyā ca na avidyā parihāsyate

original: avidyātvaṃ yato 'nyasya sānyarūpaṃ prakāśayet // MVibhr_150 //
analyzed: avidyā tvam yatas nyasya sā anya rūpam prakāśayet

original: bādhyajñānasya mithyātvaṃ nānyathā vyavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: bādhya jñānasya mithyātvam na anyathā vyavatiṣṭhate

original: tena yāvad bādhanīyaṃ tāvan mithyeti yujyate // MVibhr_154 //
analyzed: tena yāvat bādhanīyam tāvat mithyā iti yujyate

original: bhrāntijñeye ca bāhyatvaṃ bādhakair na nirasyate /
analyzed: bhrānti jñeye ca bāhya tvam bādhakaiḥ na nirasyate

original: na gamyate 'ntarvartitvaṃ nānirvācyatayā matiḥ // MVibhr_155 //
analyzed: na gamyate ntar varti tvam na anirvācya tayā matiḥ

original: kiṃ tv ataddeśakālatvaṃ gamyate bāhyavastunaḥ /
analyzed: kim tu a tad deśa kāla tvam gamyate bāhya vastunaḥ

original: tasmān na bāhyavastutvaṃ mṛṣā bodhān na bādhanāt // MVibhr_156 //
analyzed: tasmāt na bāhya vastu tvam mṛṣā bodhāt na bādhanāt

original: prasaktapratiṣedhātmā bādho 'khyātau na yujyate /
analyzed: prasakta pratiṣedha ātmā bādho khyātau na yujyate

original: sādhayaty anyathā khyātiṃ bādha eva ca naḥ sphuṭam // MVibhr_157 //
analyzed: sādhayati anyathā khyātim bādhaḥ eva ca naḥ sphuṭam

original: prasañjikā hi nākhyātir asmatpakṣe tu yujyate /
analyzed: prasañjikā hi nā akhyātiḥ asmad pakṣe tu yujyate

original: na cāgrahaniṣedho 'yaṃ sarvajñānaprasaṅgataḥ // MVibhr_158 //
analyzed: na ca agraha niṣedhaḥ yam sarva jñāna prasaṅgataḥ

original: vivekadhīr niṣedho 'yaṃ na pratītyānugamyate /
analyzed: viveka dhīḥ niṣedhaḥ yam na pratītya anugamyate

original: na krame yaugapadye vā vivekamatir īdṛśī // MVibhr_159 //
analyzed: na krame yaugapadye vā viveka matiḥ īdṛśī

original: avivekagrahe syāc cet satyaṃ na tu viviktayoḥ /
analyzed: aviveka grahe syāt ced satyam na tu viviktayoḥ

original: agrahe prāptyabhāvena prāpteḥ pūrvaṃ tu yujyate // MVibhr_160 // ........ ........ /
analyzed: agrahe prāpti abhāvena prāpteḥ pūrvam tu yujyate

original: dvayor abhāvāt svapne ca viveko gamyate kayoḥ // MVibhr_161 //
analyzed: dvayoḥ abhāvāt svapne ca vivekaḥ gamyate kayoḥ

original: smṛtatvenāvivikte cet tathā bādhā vihanyate /
analyzed: smṛta tvena avivikte ced tathā bādhā vihanyate

original: syāt sarvaivaṃvidhā bādhā paścāt dharmiṇi dharmadhīḥ // MVibhr_162 //
analyzed: syāt sarvā evaṃvidhā bādhā paścāt dharmiṇi dharma dhīḥ

original: tad yuktaṃ bādhakajñānād vācoyuktir iyaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tat yuktam bādhaka jñānāt vācoyuktiḥ iyam bhavet

original: arthe 'nyathāpi saty eṣa dhiyākāraḥ pratīyate // MVibhr_163 //
analyzed: arthe nyathā api sati eṣa dhiyākāraḥ pratīyate

original: ātmakhyātau sarvam evāntar āhuḥ śūnyakhyātau śūnyam eveti kecit /
analyzed: ātma khyātau sarvam eva antar āhuḥ śūnya khyātau śūnyam eva iti kecid

original: akhyātau no tattvamithyāvibhāgas tasmād eṣāṃ vibhramāṇāṃ vivekaḥ // MVibhr_164 //
analyzed: akhyātau no tattva mithyā vibhāgaḥ tasmāt eṣām vibhramāṇām vivekaḥ
